TopicTitle: Select EVA model for kerbal / custom EVA model?

Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that can select the type of kerbal model when EVA?

What I want is a mod that can use the ground crew model when I EVA at Kerbin. Maybe somehow assign the model to that specific kerbal permanently when you spawn him in game.

So the ground operations kerbals do not look like astronauts.
I think this will do what you need: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/161898-131texturereplacerreplaced-v054/
